name.description: The name of the widget or activity.

description.description: A short description of the purpose of this widget.

integration.description: How this widget should be loaded by the LaxarJS runtime.

type.description: Type of the artifact, e.g. widget or activity.

technology.description: Underlying technology of the widget, which will be used to load the controller and template.

controls.description: Each control as a path that can be resolved using the module system

features.description: A JSON schema for the widget feature configuration.

compatibility.description: Compatibility flags set for this widget

templateSource.description: The location of the widget's HTML template.

styleSource.description: The location of the widget's stylesheet.

assets.description: A list of files to make available as raw content via the artifact provider API.

assetUrls.description: A list of files to make available as URLs via the artifact provider API.

assetsForTheme.description: A list of themed files to make available as raw content via the artifact provider API.

assetUrlsForTheme.description: A list of themed files to make available as URLs via the artifact provider API.
